name: Zombies.io (SideQuest)
description:
Zombies.io is a Free to Play Online Multiplayer Arena Battle Game. Players must grab a weapon, from melee axes and knives, to a range of different guns and explosive - then fight against the zombie horde and other players - last man standing wins!

=== Controls ===

MOVE :: [WASD] or [Arrow] Keys
SPRINT :: Hold [Shift] Key
AIM + ATTACK :: Mouse + Left Click
SWITCH WEAPONS :: [1/2] Key
RELOAD :: [R] Key
EQUIP :: [E] Key
DROP :: [G] Key
